page.title: 09Warslow and Hulme End shops
page.content: The shop in {Warslow} has been run by the same person for 47 years. You can buy groceries, tobacco products and petrol there. Most local people buy their bread and papers there. The shop is open from 8.30a.m. until 6p.m. during the week and from 11a.m. until 6p.m. at weekends. The shop is stocked up once a week from a cash and carry outlet in Hanley but the owner also buys things from local travelling shops. Most of the custom is from locals. The shop in {Hulme End} sells many things from fresh fruit and groceries to stationery and opens 7 days a week from 8.30a.m. until 7.30p.m. It is stocked up once or twice a week from a cash and carry outlet in the Potteries. Most custom comes from locals but the shop is busiest in the summer when campers are in nearby fields.
